parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CEM can cause various electrical systems to malfunction, including the wipers, lights, and airbag system, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
Water leaks can cause electrical systems to malfunction, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Water leaking into the passenger side floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition switch can cause the vehicle to stall or fail to start, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
Headlight malfunction can cause reduced visibility, leading to accidents or near-misses.
Anti-skid error and ABS malfunction can cause loss of control, leading to accidents.
Fire hazard can cause damage to the vehicle and potentially harm occupants.
symptoms: Fire starting in the rear near the battery compartment

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature tire wear or failure can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: or uneven wear; loud noise while driving; difficulty steering; and sudden loss of tire pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of accountability from manufacturers (Volvo and Pirelli) can lead to a delay in addressing the tire wear/failure issue, putting drivers at risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Manufacturers blame each other for the problem
and do not provide adequate support or replacement options for affected owners.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inferior tire quality can lead to premature wear or failure, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: " with excessive wear or failure occurring at low mileage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling or shutting off of the engine can cause loss of power, loss of steering, and difficulty controlling the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine stalls or shuts off without warning
often while driving at high speeds
the vehicle may not restart immediately
the check engine light may come on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Fuel system issues can cause fuel leaks, engine stalling, and difficulty starting the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or fires.
Worn suspension mounts and defective sensors can cause abnormal noises, reduced engine performance, and difficulty controlling the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
Engine performance issues can cause reduced engine power, difficulty accelerating, and loss of vehicle control, which can lead to accidents or difficulty driving.
Engine failure can cause complete loss of engine power, difficulty controlling the vehicle, and accidents or strandings.
